message: Let's be fair and split it close to equal, but I get a bit more since I made the offer
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Come on Bob, you know time is on my side. Let's settle this before the money loses more value for you
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is fair and we both lose if this drags on.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a little less this time. Take it before it's too late
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a small hit to end this now.  Don't be greedy!
You're really running out of time, Bob. I'll give you a little less again. Don't let it slip away
Alice, I'm making a final offer. It's more than generous considering the time pressure. Let's be done with this!
It's getting late, Bob. You're losing a lot of value. This is a good deal for you, all things considered
